attributes.action: Refuse access to immigrants who have a criminal record (UK or Overseas)
attributes.additional_details:
I believe it is wrong that the police work hard to catch criminals and measures are put into place to prevent people committing crimes yet we allow people to settle in the UK who have committed crimes, whether it is petty crimes such as mugging or heinous crimes such as rape.

Do the right thing and keep Britain safe, MP's are here for British people so do what's best for them.
